lines.text:
[Driving]
Mr. Chan, is this the shortest way to prison?
No, shortest way is commit crime.

[to Morgan]
Government work keep me hopping like dissatisfied flea from dog to dog.
Charlie, what can one man do against the entire legal force of the state?
Ancient proverb say, "One small wind can raise much dust."
Please continue.
That's all I have to say.
That's what woman always say, yet go right on talking.
"Earthquake may shatter rock, but sand upon which rock stood still right there in same old place."
Hurry? Why do you always have to hurry to a murder? Why can't you just ooze on down to one?
Listen, are you trying to pin something on me?

[holding her skimpy dance costume]
No, merely at moment trying to figure how you pin upon yourself such very few feathers.

[to Birmingham and Tommy]
Always sitting! Wish you would wear out brains instead of seat of pants.
Pop, we have been thinking...
Most impossible.
Oh, yes sir, Mr. Chan. We've been thinkin'.
And now you have a headache.
Skeletons in closets always speak loudest to police.
You two not afraid?
Afraid of what, Pop?
That you sit down so often you get concussion of brain.
Pop, I got a swell idea!
Good. Save it for old age.
I will sit in car while you two enjoy nervous breakdown.
Being a detective is an ugly trade.
Ugliest trade sometimes have moment of joy. Even gravedigger know some people for whom he would do his work with extreme pleasure.
You don't even know what a lawsuit is.
Sure I do. It's something that the police wears.
Son Tommy is noisy woodpecker on family tree.
I see where the bullets are coming from.
Yeah, but I don't wanna look no bullets in the eye.
